document_data.name: Mermaid's Bosom
document_data.mainbody: The '''Mermaid's Bosom''' was a large vile inn, even by [[orc]] standards, found in the [[Hillsfar Docks|dock section]] of [[Hillsfar]] around [[1367 DR]]. [[Maalthiir]]'s hoped visitors to the city would stop here first and kill each other, saving the [[Red Plumes]] the effort.
document_data.Description: Blood, [[ale]], and saliva made the floor slick in the Mermaid's Bosom.
document_data.Location: The inn was situated on the coast of the [[Moonsea (lake)|Moonsea]] near the main docks.
document_data.Services: A room could be had for 3 [[gp]] per night. Murder and robbery were common occurrences in the Mermaid's Bosom.
